fullplot: Enchanted by the idea of locating treasure buried by Captain Flint, Squire Trelawney, Dr. Livesey and Jim Hawkins charter a sailing voyage to a Caribbean island. Unfortunately, a large number of Flint's old pirate crew are aboard the ship, including Long John Silver.
plot: The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate captain Long John Silver.
title: Treasure Island
